thread.title: A very satisfied customer . E S
thread.title_full: Mabel's Labels reviewed by A very satisfied customer . E S

author: A very satisfied customer . E S
title: A very satisfied customer . E S
text:
My son's now 9 years old and I've been using their ever since he started day care, and I just love everything about Mabel's Labels . Excellent customer service/ support outstanding quality.. No other company can can be compared. Great pricing, just look out for the slales .
Thank you guys for saving my son's belongings @ school , hockey camp and over night camps.
Don't take my word for why not give them a try? you would not regret it :)
